name: transport_bicycle
description: (LVL 5) Leg day! Travel in 4min, no costs per travel.

name: transport_car
description: (LVL 10) Faster than a lawn mower! Travel in 3min but costs $10 for fuel each travel.

name: transport_boat
description: (LVL 15) Make Aquaman jealous! Travel in 2min but costs $200 for fuel each travel.

name: transport_helicopter

name: transport_portalgun
description: (LVL 25) The cake is a lie! Travel instantly but costs $50,000 for energy each travel.
